header_text: Recently, you have felt like you are in a good place financially and were looking into getting the car you have always wanted. However, after getting your HD diagnosis, you feel like getting the car will be a waste since you may not be able to drive in a couple years. You are disappointed.

elements.text: Your partner says that they will be happy to drive you around in your new car one day, if needed. This makes you feel...

elements.name: Recently, you have felt like you are in a good place financially and were looking into getting the car you have always wanted.
